statements: SELECT * FROM player_interactions WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT player_id, interaction_type FROM player_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type, interaction_details FROM player_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'comment' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM player_interactions WHERE interaction_timestamp BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM player_interactions GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_interactions > 5;
SELECT * FROM player_interactions WHERE player_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT player_id, interaction_type FROM player_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'login' AND interaction_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY player_id DESC;

SELECT player_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM player_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'purchase' AND player_id IN ('98765432-9876-5432-9876-543298765432', '87654321-8765-4321-8765-432187654321');

SELECT interaction_id, player_id, interaction_type, to_char(interaction_timestamp, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS formatted_timestamp FROM player_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'login' OR interaction_type = 'logout' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM player_interactions WHERE interaction_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND interaction_details ->> 'event' = 'level up' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_interactions WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM player_interactions WHERE duration_seconds > 60;
SELECT * FROM game_design_feedback ORDER BY satisfaction_rating DESC;
SELECT feedback_text FROM game_design_feedback WHERE feedback_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, MAX(duration_seconds) FROM player_interactions GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT * FROM player_interactions WHERE player_id = 1 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM player_interactions GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_id, interaction_type, duration_seconds FROM player_interactions WHERE duration_seconds > 60 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT player_id, feedback_text FROM game_design_feedback WHERE satisfaction_rating > 3 AND feedback_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY feedback_timestamp DESC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT player_id) AS unique_players, AVG(satisfaction_rating) AS avg_satisfaction FROM game_design_feedback WHERE satisfaction_rating IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM player_interactions WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM player_interactions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT interaction_data FROM player_interactions WHERE game_session_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT player_id, interaction_type FROM player_interactions WHERE interaction_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM game_design WHERE game_genre = 'Action' ORDER BY release_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM player_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'achievement' AND interaction_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM player_interactions WHERE game_session_id = 'abc123';
SELECT player_id, interaction_type, JSONB_ARRAY_LENGTH(interaction_data) AS data_length FROM player_interactions WHERE interaction_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM player_interactions GROUP BY player_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10 ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT p.player_id, p.start_timestamp, s.session_duration, g.game_name FROM player_sessions p JOIN game_design g ON p.player_id = g.designer_id WHERE p.start_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM player_interactions;
SELECT player_id, interaction_type, interaction_time FROM player_interactions WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT MAX(interaction_time) AS latest_interaction FROM player_interactions;
SELECT player_id, session_start_time, session_end_time FROM player_sessions WHERE session_end_time > '2023-01-01';
SELECT level_id, level_name, level_difficulty FROM game_levels ORDER BY level_difficulty DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'login';
SELECT player_id, interaction_type FROM player_interactions WHERE interaction_time BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT interaction_id, player_id, interaction_time FROM player_interactions ORDER BY interaction_time DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, player_id, feedback_rating FROM player_feedback WHERE feedback_rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_rating DESC;
SELECT level_id, level_name, level_difficulty FROM game_levels WHERE level_difficulty > 3 ORDER BY level_difficulty ASC;
SELECT * FROM PlayerInteractions;
SELECT player_id, interaction_type FROM PlayerInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'like';
SELECT player_id, interaction_timestamp FROM PlayerInteractions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM PlayerInteractions GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_name, player_age, player_country FROM PlayerProfiles WHERE player_age > 25;
SELECT * FROM PlayerInteractions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC, player_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_name, player_age, player_country FROM PlayerProfiles WHERE player_age > 18 AND player_country = 'USA';
SELECT game_name, game_genre, game_platform FROM GameCatalog WHERE game_genre = 'Adventure' ORDER BY game_name ASC;

SELECT player_name, feedback_text, feedback_timestamp FROM PlayerProfiles JOIN PlayerFeedback ON PlayerProfiles.player_id = PlayerFeedback.player_id WHERE PlayerProfiles.player_age > 25 ORDER BY feedback_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT session_id, player_id, session_start, session_end FROM GameSessions WHERE player_id = 'a92c0b15-0ff5-4e57-933c-22fd13574c8b' ORDER BY session_end ASC LIMIT 5;
